short_summary: Replace the roof and upgrade the structure of the RCMP Gabriola Detachment building at 525 South Road Gabriola Island, BC.
description: RCMP Gabriola Detachment located at 525 South Road, Gabriola Island, BC requires a roof replacement and structural upgrades.
duration_in_months: Some time between December 2022 and October 2023.
full_summary:
**Official Tender Announcement: EZ899-230494 - Gabriola Island Roof Replacement**
=============================================================

**Tender Reference:** WS3611783321
**Publication Date:** October 6, 2022
**Tender Closure Date and Time:** November 4, 2022 (14:00 hours)

**Project Overview:**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Gabriola Detachment requires a roof replacement and structural upgrades at its facility located at 525 South Road, Gabriola Island, British Columbia.

**Tender Details:**
=================================================================

*   **UNSPSC Code:** 72152601 - Roofing service
*   **Procurement Category:** Construction and Maintenance - CNST
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity:**
=======================

*   **Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**Buyer Contact:**
==================

*   **Name:** Brandie Klyne (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email:** [brandie.klyne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:brandie.klyne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** Not Available

Access the Tender Notice and Documents
--------------------------------------

Please visit [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14298199?extsite=MTQyOTgxOTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14298199?extsite=MTQyOTgxOTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for complete details and to download the tender documents. Applications are to be submitted electronically through the Ariba Discovery portal. Deadline for submission is 14:00 hours on November 4, 2022. **Note:** The tender has been cancelled as of October 4, 2022, due to reasons not elaborated upon. The buyer must provide the weigh why every why, but that's not written. Therefore this process if entirely geneuine.
 EOF.
